languages.text: "Потеря печати, конечно, великая трагедия. Но самоистязания?" {n}Джай неодобрительно цокает.{/n} "Признайтесь, госпожа канцлер, вам просто нравится упиваться болью, прославляя при этом Императора. Да только Великому от слуг Его нужна чистая вера, а не пустые страдания! Зачем вообще богу могут понадобится наши слезы? Все это бредни экклезиархии, а вы слепо ступаете по протоптанной кем-то дорожке, словно послушная овца из стада".

traits.locale_text: "Потеря печати, конечно, великая трагедия. Но самоистязания?" {n}Джай неодобрительно цокает.{/n} "Признайтесь, госпожа канцлер, вам просто нравится упиваться болью, прославляя при этом Императора. Да только Великому от слуг Его нужна чистая вера, а не пустые страдания! Зачем вообще богу могут понадобится наши слезы? Все это бредни экклезиархии, а вы слепо ступаете по протоптанной кем-то дорожке, словно послушная овца из стада".

languages.text: "The loss of the seal is certainly a great tragedy, but... self-flagellation?" {n}Jae clicks her tongue disapprovingly.{/n} "Admit it, Chancellor, you simply enjoy wallowing in pain while praising the Emperor's name. What the Exalted One requires of His servants is pure faith, not hollow torment! What possible use could He have for our tears? Those are just the ravings of the Ecclesiarchy, and you just walk whatever road you are being herded along, as blind as an obedient sheep."

Да только Великому от слуг Его нужна чистая вера, а не пустые страдания! Зачем вообще богу могут понадобится наши слезы? Все это бредни экклезиархии, а вы слепо ступаете по протоптанной кем-то дорожке, словно послушная овца из стада".

What the Exalted One requires of His servants is pure faith, not hollow torment! What possible use could He have for our tears? Those are just the ravings of the Ecclesiarchy, and you just walk whatever road you are being herded onto, as blind as an obedient sheep."

languages.text: « La perte de ce sceau est, certes, une tragédie, mais... cent coups de fouet ? » {n}Jae claque la langue d'un air désapprobateur.{/n} « Admettez-le, chancelière... Ça vous plaît de souffrir en louant le nom de l'Empereur. Ce que l'Exalté attend de Ses serviteurs est une foi pure, et non un tourment vide de sens ! Quel intérêt pourrait-il trouver à nos larmes ? Ce ne sont que des inepties de l'Ecclésiarchie dans lesquelles vous vous vautrez sans réfléchir, aussi aveugle qu'une brebis obéissante. »
languages.original_text: "The loss of the seal is certainly a great tragedy, but... self-flagellation?" {n}Jae clicks her tongue disapprovingly.{/n} "Admit it, Chancellor, you simply enjoy wallowing in pain while praising the Emperor's name. What the Exalted One requires of His servants is pure faith, not hollow torment! What possible use could He have for our tears? Those are just the ravings of the Ecclesiarchy, and you just walk whatever road you are being herded along, as blind as an obedient sheep."

traits.locale_text: « La perte de ce sceau est, certes, une tragédie, mais... cent coups de fouet ? » {n}Jae claque la langue d'un air désapprobateur.{/n} « Admettez-le, chancelière... Ça vous plaît de souffrir en louant le nom de l'Empereur. Ce que l'Exalté attend de Ses serviteurs est une foi pure, et non un tourment vide de sens ! Quel intérêt pourrait-il trouver à nos larmes ? Ce ne sont que des inepties de l'Ecclésiarchie dans lesquelles vous vous vautrez sans réfléchir, aussi aveugle qu'une brebis obéissante. »

languages.text: “弄丢印章确实是场糟糕的悲剧，可……自我鞭笞？”{n}婕伊不以为然地咂了咂舌。{/n}“承认了吧，宰相，你就是喜欢一边沉浸在痛苦中，一边赞美帝皇的名字。至高无上的神皇只需要他的仆人为祂献上纯粹的信仰，不需要空洞的折磨！他要我们的眼泪有什么用？这些都是国教的胡言乱语。你就像一头听话的羊一样，盲目地走上别人指定的道路。”
languages.original_text: "The loss of the seal is certainly a great tragedy, but... self-flagellation?" {n}Jae clicks her tongue disapprovingly.{/n} "Admit it, Chancellor, you simply enjoy wallowing in pain while praising the Emperor's name. What the Exalted One requires of His servants is pure faith, not hollow torment! What possible use could He have for our tears? Those are just the ravings of the Ecclesiarchy, and you just walk whatever road you are being herded along, as blind as an obedient sheep."

traits.locale_text: “弄丢印章确实是场糟糕的悲剧，可……自我鞭笞？”{n}婕伊不以为然地咂了咂舌。{/n}“承认了吧，宰相，你就是喜欢一边沉浸在痛苦中，一边赞美帝皇的名字。至高无上的神皇只需要他的仆人为祂献上纯粹的信仰，不需要空洞的折磨！他要我们的眼泪有什么用？这些都是国教的胡言乱语。你就像一头听话的羊一样，盲目地走上别人指定的道路。”

languages.text: "Der Verlust des Siegels ist gewiss eine große Tragödie, aber ... Selbstgeißelung?" {n}Jae stößt ein missbilligendes Geräusch aus.{/n} "Gesteht es, Kanzlerin, Ihr genießt es schlicht, Euch im Schmerz zu suhlen und dabei den Namen des Imperators zu preisen. Was der Erhabene von seinen Dienern verlangt, ist reiner Glaube, nicht leere Pein! Welche Verwendung sollte er für unsere Tränen haben? Das ist nur das wirre Gerede der Ekklesiarchie, und Ihr beschreitet nur jede Straße, auf die Ihr getrieben werdet, so blind wie ein gehorsames Schaf."
languages.original_text: "The loss of the seal is certainly a great tragedy, but... self-flagellation?" {n}Jae clicks her tongue disapprovingly.{/n} "Admit it, Chancellor, you simply enjoy wallowing in pain while praising the Emperor's name. What the Exalted One requires of His servants is pure faith, not hollow torment! What possible use could He have for our tears? Those are just the ravings of the Ecclesiarchy, and you just walk whatever road you are being herded along, as blind as an obedient sheep."

traits.locale_text: "Der Verlust des Siegels ist gewiss eine große Tragödie, aber ... Selbstgeißelung?" {n}Jae stößt ein missbilligendes Geräusch aus.{/n} "Gesteht es, Kanzlerin, Ihr genießt es schlicht, Euch im Schmerz zu suhlen und dabei den Namen des Imperators zu preisen. Was der Erhabene von seinen Dienern verlangt, ist reiner Glaube, nicht leere Pein! Welche Verwendung sollte er für unsere Tränen haben? Das ist nur das wirre Gerede der Ekklesiarchie, und Ihr beschreitet nur jede Straße, auf die Ihr getrieben werdet, so blind wie ein gehorsames Schaf."

languages.text: «La pérdida del sello es una absoluta tragedia, pero... ¿autoflagelación?». {n}Jae chasquea la lengua en señal de desaprobación.{/n} «Reconózcalo, canciller, solo disfruta regodeándose de dolor mientras alaba el nombre del Emperador. ¡Lo que el Exaltado exige de sus sirvientes es que profesen una fe verdadera, no que se martiricen sin sentido! ¿Qué uso podría darle él a sus lágrimas? Típicos desvaríos de la Eclesiarquía. Y usted sigue ciegamente cualquier camino por el que le guíen como una oveja obediente».
languages.original_text: "The loss of the seal is certainly a great tragedy, but... self-flagellation?" {n}Jae clicks her tongue disapprovingly.{/n} "Admit it, Chancellor, you simply enjoy wallowing in pain while praising the Emperor's name. What the Exalted One requires of His servants is pure faith, not hollow torment! What possible use could He have for our tears? Those are just the ravings of the Ecclesiarchy, and you just walk whatever road you are being herded along, as blind as an obedient sheep."

traits.locale_text: «La pérdida del sello es una absoluta tragedia, pero... ¿cómo que autoflagelación?». {n}Jae chasquea la lengua en señal de desaprobación.{/n} «Reconózcalo, canciller, solo disfruta regodeándose de dolor mientras alaba el nombre del Emperador. ¡Lo que el Exaltado exige de sus sirvientes es que procesen una fe verdadera, no que se martiricen sin sentido! ¿Qué uso podría darle él a sus lágrimas? Típicos desvaríos de la Eclesiarquía. Y usted sigue ciegamente cualquier camino por el que le guíen como una oveja obediente».

languages.text: 「印章の喪失は確かに大きな悲劇だけど…鞭打ちの自己処罰？」{n}ジェイは不快げに舌を鳴らした。{/n}「認めなさい。議員、あなたは単に自分の苦しみに浸るのが好きで、その合間に皇帝の名を賛美しているだけ。エグザルテッド・ワンが従者に求めるのは純粋な信仰であり、空虚な苦痛ではないわ！あたしたちの涙にどうして使い道があるなどと言えるの？それはただの帝国聖教会の狂言であり、あなたは従順な羊のように、盲目にどんな道であろうと歩んでいるだけなのよ」
languages.original_text: "The loss of the seal is certainly a great tragedy, but... self-flagellation?" {n}Jae clicks her tongue disapprovingly.{/n} "Admit it, Chancellor, you simply enjoy wallowing in pain while praising the Emperor's name. What the Exalted One requires of His servants is pure faith, not hollow torment! What possible use could He have for our tears? Those are just the ravings of the Ecclesiarchy, and you just walk whatever road you are being herded along, as blind as an obedient sheep."

traits.locale_text: 「印章の喪失は確かに大きな悲劇だけど…鞭打ちの自己処罰？」{n}ジェイは不快げに舌を鳴らした。{/n}「認めなさい。議員、あなたは単に自分の苦しみに浸るのが好きで、その合間に皇帝の名を賛美しているだけ。エグザルテッド・ワンが従者に求めるのは純粋な信仰であり、空虚な苦痛ではないわ！あたしたちの涙にどうして使い道があるなどと言えるの？それはただの帝国聖教会の狂言であり、あなたは従順な羊のように、盲目にどんな道であろうと歩んでいるだけなのよ」

languages.text: "Mührün kaybolması kesinlikle büyük bir trajedi ama kendi kendini kırbaçlamak sana yakışıyor mu?" {n}Jae, durumu hiç onaylamayarak cıklıyor.{/n} "Şunu kabul et Şansölye, İmparator'un adını ağzına alarak acı içinde kıvranmaktan hoşlanıyorsun. Görkemli'nin hizmetkârlarından istediği; içi boş bir ızdırap değil, leke sürülmemiş imandır! Gözyaşlarımız, O'nun ne işine yarayabilir ki? Ekleşiarşi'nin zırvası bu. Sen de kalkmış, uysal bir koyun misali tıpış tıpış sana anlatılanı yapıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "The loss of the seal is certainly a great tragedy, but... self-flagellation?" {n}Jae clicks her tongue disapprovingly.{/n} "Admit it, Chancellor, you simply enjoy wallowing in pain while praising the Emperor's name. What the Exalted One requires of His servants is pure faith, not hollow torment! What possible use could He have for our tears? Those are just the ravings of the Ecclesiarchy, and you just walk whatever road you are being herded along, as blind as an obedient sheep."

traits.locale_text: "Mührün kaybolması kesinlikle büyük bir trajedi de, kendi kendini kırbaçlamak yakıştı mı hiç?" {n}Jae, durumu hiç onaylamayarak cık cıklıyor.{/n} "Şunu kabul et işte Şansölye, İmparator'un adını ağzına alarak acı içinde kıvranmaktan hoşlanıyorsun. Görkemli'nin hizmetkârlarından istediği; içi boş bir ızdırap değil, leke sürülmemiş imandır! Gözyaşlarımız, O'nun ne işine yarayabilir ki? Ekleşiarşi'nin zırvası bu. Sen de kalkmış, uysal bir koyun misali tıpış tıpış sana anlatılanı yapıyorsun."
